other_details.en: A structured guideline used to determine the clinical Tumour-Node-Metastasis (TNM) classification and stage grouping for cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma (cSCC) of the head and neck (excluding eyelids), according to the UICC 8th edition.

gt0001.text: TNM classification for cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck (clinical)
gt0001.description: A structured guideline used to determine the clinical Tumour-Node-Metastasis (TNM) classification and stage grouping for cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma (cSCC) of the head and neck (excluding eyelids), according to the UICC 8th edition.
